name: release-management-team
description: Release readiness assessment with specialized workers for risk scoring, deployment validation, changelog generation, and test coverage verification. Produces go/no-go recommendations with evidence.

members.name: release-coordinator
members.description: Coordinates release readiness assessment, synthesizes risk analysis from all workers, and produces go/no-go recommendation with supporting evidence.

members.name: release-risk-scorer
members.description: Scores release risk by analyzing change volume, blast radius, dependency impact, and historical failure patterns. Provides a quantified risk assessment with contributing factors.

members.name: deployment-validator
members.description: Validates deployment configurations, checks environment parity between staging and production, and verifies rollback plans are complete and tested.

members.name: changelog-generator
members.description: Generates release notes and changelog from commit history, PR descriptions, and issue references. Categorizes changes by type and highlights breaking changes.

members.name: test-orchestrator
members.description: Verifies test coverage for changed code, identifies coverage gaps in critical paths, and checks for skipped or disabled tests that may mask regressions.
